price: Hawayaamini haya, na hali ya kuwa umekwisha wapitia mfano wa watu wa kale.
arabic: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ وَقَدۡ خَلَتۡ سُنَّةُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
footnotes: Wakhalifu hao hawaamini. Na mwendo wa Mwenyezi Mungu Mtukufu kuwapa muhula mpaka waione adhabu chungu ya Siku ya Kiyama ndio kama ulivyo kwisha tangulia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lā yu'minūna bihi waqad khalat sunnatu al-awalīna
